Key Match Events: The White Sox defeated the Angels 7-0 on Thursday, Sept. 26, 2024, fueled by a season-high seven-run inning and 6 1/3 innings of pitching from Chris Flexen.
Post-Match Reflections: The White Sox remain tied with the 1962 New York Mets for the most losses in one season, avoiding breaking the all-time loss record.
